title: Waterfront Hotel in Southern Texas with Four Restaurants, Salon & Pool
description:
Experience Texas hospitality at its finest at this plush waterfront hotel, ideally located for exploring Corpus Christi's vibrant downtown area, historic Seawall District and beautiful Bayfront Park.

With four tantalising restaurants on site, you can savour fresh seafood and prime steaks at Republic of Texas Bar and Grill, enjoy a morning coffee at Morsel's or sip Mezcal cocktails at Caller & Critic. Unwind by the heated swimming pool, bask in tranquil bay views from your private balcony or enjoy a rejuvenating hair treatment at Nomad Salon.
offer_address: 900 North Shoreline Boulevard, Corpus Christi, Texas 78401, United States
